publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7812 Mary Scanlon: Castle Stuart Golf Links to Stage 2011 Scottish Open—That the Parliament welcomes the decision of the European Tour to stage the 2011 Barclays Scottish Open Championship at Castle Stuart Golf Links; notes that Castle Stuart Golf Links will become the seventh Scottish course to host this prestigious tournament since 1972; warmly welcomes the revenue that this event will bring to the Highlands and the north-east coast of Scotland and the host of stars from the golfing world who will compete at the links course before moving on to the 140th Open Championship at Royal St George’s in Kent; believes that the decision to hold the Scottish Open at Castle Stuart Golf Links underlines the high regard that the course is held in, having been voted Best New Course in 2009 by Golf Magazine USA, and looks forward to welcoming players and fans to the Highlands for what it considers is sure to be a great golfing occasion.

S3M-7812 Mary Scanlon: Castle Stuart Golf Links to Stage 2011 Scottish Open—That the Parliament welcomes the decision of the European Tour to stage the 2011 Barclays Scottish Open Championship at Castle Stuart Golf Links; notes that Castle Stuart Golf Links will become the seventh Scottish course to host this prestigious tournament since 1972; warmly welcomes the revenue that this event will bring to the Highlands and the north-east coast of Scotland and the host of stars from the golfing world who will compete at the links course before moving on to the 140th Open Championship at Royal St George’s in Kent; believes that the decision to hold the Scottish Open at Castle Stuart Golf Links underlines the high regard that the course is held in, having been voted Best New Course in 2009 by Golf Magazine USA, and looks forward to welcoming players and fans to the Highlands for what it considers is sure to be a great golfing occasion. Supported by: Bill Aitken*, Kenneth Gibson*, Rob Gibson*, David McLetchie*, Jackson Carlaw*, Murdo Fraser*, Nanette Milne*, Jamie McGrigor*, John Lamont*, Bill Kidd*, John Wilson*, Brian Adam*, Dave Thompson*
S3M-7812 Castle Stuart Golf Links to Stage 2011 Scottish Open (lodged on 27 January 2011) Joe FitzPatrick*, Margaret Mitchell*
S3M-7812 Castle Stuart Golf Links to Stage 2011 Scottish Open (lodged on 27 January 2011) Maureen Watt*, Jamie Hepburn*
